speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Ask me what time it is.

speaker: Male Speaker
text: Quelle heure est-il s'il vous plaît?
narrator_cue: Ask me what time it is.

speaker: Male Speaker
text: Mais non, il est huit heures.

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: Ask how much you owe me.

speaker: Male Speaker

text: Est-ce que vous avez seize francs?

narrator_cue: Ask the saleswoman how much you owe.

text: Est-ce que vous avez cinq dollars?

speaker: Female Speaker

narrator_cue: Tell her you don't have any francs.
